sys_variable_value.value:
Thank you for booking a ride with Senior Rides,

 

A driver will reach out to you shortly.

If you have any questions please reach out to the support team or refer to our knowledge article here.

 

Warm regards,

Senior Rides Team

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Driver updates status to "In journey" when user is picked up
Status is updated to "Driver on the way" when the ride request is confirmed
Driver updates status to "Completed" when the ride session is over

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Status is updated to "Driver on the way" when the ride request is confirmed
Driver updates status to "Completed" when the ride session is over
Driver updates status to "In journey" when user is picked up

sys_variable_value.value:
Thank you for booking a ride with Senior Rides,

 

A driver will reach out to you shortly.

If you have any questions please reach out to the support team or refer to our knowledge article here.

 

Warm regards,

Senior Rides Team
